rect.style: stroke-width: 5; paint-order: stroke; stroke: rgb(85, 111, 218); fill: rgb(255, 255, 255);

text.style: fill: none; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 45px; font-weight: 700; stroke: rgb(85, 111, 218); stroke-width: 2; white-space: pre;
fill: rgb(85, 111, 218); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 30px; white-space: pre;
fill: rgb(246, 48, 48); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 44px; font-weight: 700; white-space: pre; text-anchor: middle;
